| HistoryText             = The group known as the Seven Friendless are a collection of entities who are the anthropomorphic personifications of seven concepts fundamental to the universe as it is perceived by mortal minds. There are so called because they are so devoted to their jobs that they have no friends. [[Eternity (Earth-616)|Eternity]] seems to be the oldest of the Friendless; at least two of the others regard Eternity as a father.{{r|Captain Marvel Vol 5 #25}}

| Equipment               =

| Notes                   = The "Friendless" are, in no conceivable way, a reference to the [[w:c:dc:Endless|Seven Endless]] of ''Sandman'' from DC's Vertigo imprint.
